AILogger1.summary: Adds AiLogger initialized from configuration provider to services collection as singleton service.
AILogger1.param: Key/Value pair configuration provider. Must contain keys InstrumentationKey, Application and Component

AILogger2.summary: Adds AiLogger initialized from parameters as singleton service. Used for apps consisting of modules that consist of components.
AILogger2.param: Instumentation key for chosen AppInsights instance

AILogger3.summary: Adds AiLogger initialized from parameters as singleton service. Used for apps consisting of components without modules.
AILogger3.param: Instumentation key for chosen AppInsights instance

AiLogger4.summary: Adds AiLogger initialized from parameters as singleton service. Used for apps consisting of components without modules, that run in multiple instances on 1 or more roles.
AiLogger4.param: Instumentation key for chosen AppInsights instance

AiLoggerConfig1.summary: Adds TelemetryClientConfiguration to services collection as singleton service. Helps with scenarios where you want to use preconfigured configuration object by multiple TelemetryClients.
AiLoggerConfig1.param: Preconfigured configuration object created by caller.
